comments: The first column of the triangle (see example) appears to be A167750. [_Joerg Arndt_, Jul 09 2012]
maple: a[ 0,0 ] := 1; for i from 1 to N do a[ i,0 ] := a[ i-1,0 ]+a[ i-1,1 ]; for j from 1 to i do a[ i,j ] := sum(a[ i-j,t ],t=0..min(j+1,N)) od; od;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ [ I have temporarily mislaid the name of the person who sent this ]
extensions: Sequence corrected by _Sean A. Irvine_, Jul 08 2012
